<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### allocateScavengingFrameIndexesNearIncomingSP() {#a3e10030e29b44005e890545f685d7c30}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::MipsFrameLowering::allocateScavengingFrameIndexesNearIncomingSP (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Control the placement of special register scavenging spill slots when allocating a stack frame.

If this returns true, the frame indexes used by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> will be allocated closest to the incoming stack pointer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsframelowering-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsframelowering-h">MipsFrameLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr() {#abed147ff6b57ff3563c569f0120fe732}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock::iterator MipsFrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method is called during prolog/epilog code insertion to eliminate call frame setup and destroy pseudo instructions (but only if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> is using them).

It is responsible for eliminating these instructions, replacing them with concrete instructions. This method need only be implemented if using call frame setup/destroy pseudo instructions. Returns an iterator pointing to the instruction after the replaced one.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsframelowering-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsframelowering-h">MipsFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsframelowering-cpp/#l00132">132</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsframelowering-cpp">MipsFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### enableShrinkWrapping() {#aeb579de1d25b6587a7193c86a86ecffc}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Returns true if the target will correctly handle shrink wrapping.
